Sleeping Dogs: Definitive Edition is an action-adventure game developed by Feral Interactive, United Front Games and Square Enix London Studios. It was originally released in 2014. It was published by Square Enix. On review aggregator Metacritic, Sleeping Dogs: Definitive Edition has a score of 76. Most rawgers rated the game as "Recommended". You can play Sleeping Dogs: Definitive Edition on Xbox One, PC, macOS and PlayStation 4. The game is sold via Xbox Store, PlayStation Store and Steam. It was produced by Feargus Carroll and Jeff O'Connell. Jeff Tymoschuk scored the game.

Deadly Broadcast is an indie, action, adventure and strategy game developed by Apphic Games. It was originally released in 2022. It was published by Apphic Games. Deadly Broadcast is available on PC. The game is sold via Steam.

Sea of Thieves is an action-adventure massively multiplayer game developed by Rare. It was originally released in 2018. It was published by Xbox Game Studios. On review aggregator Metacritic, Sea of Thieves has a score of 68. Most rawgers rated the game as "Recommended". You can play Sea of Thieves on PC, PlayStation 5, Xbox Series S/X and Xbox One. The game is sold via Steam and Xbox Store. It was produced by Adam Park and Joe Neate. It was directed by Gregg Mayles. Robin Beanland scored the game.

Red Dead Redemption: Undead Nightmare is an action, shooter and adventure game developed by Rockstar North, Rockstar Games and Rockstar San Diego. It was originally released in 2010. Rockstar Games published the game. Red Dead Redemption: Undead Nightmare has a Metascore of 87, based on professional reviews. Most rawgers rated the game as "Recommended". Red Dead Redemption: Undead Nightmare is available on Xbox 360 and PlayStation 3. You can purchase the game on PlayStation Store and Xbox Store.

Dark Messiah of Might & Magic: Elements is an action-adventure game developed by Ubisoft. It came out on 12-02-2008. Ubisoft Entertainment published the game. Most rawgers rated the game as "Recommended". Dark Messiah of Might & Magic: Elements is available on Xbox 360. You can purchase the game on Xbox 360 Store. Julien Roby produced the game. It was directed by Raphaël Colantonio. Cris Velasco and Sascha Dikiciyan scored the game.

Sleeping Dogs is an action-adventure game developed by United Front Games and Square Enix London Studios. It was originally released in 2012. It was published by Square Enix. Sleeping Dogs has a Metascore of 81, based on professional reviews. Most rawgers rated the game as "Recommended". Sleeping Dogs is available on PC, Xbox 360 and PlayStation 3. You can purchase the game on Steam and Xbox 360 Store. Feargus Carroll and Jeff O'Connell produced the game. It was scored by Jeff Tymoschuk.

DmC: Devil May Cry is an action-adventure game developed by Ninja Theory. It came out on 15-01-2013. It was published by Capcom. On review aggregator Metacritic, DmC: Devil May Cry has a score of 85. The game is rated as "Recommended" on RAWG. You can play DmC: Devil May Cry on PlayStation 3, PC, Xbox One and PlayStation 4. You can purchase the game on Xbox 360 Store, PlayStation Store, Xbox Store and Steam. Alex Jones, Motohide Eshiro and Yohei Uchida produced the game. It was directed by Tameem Antoniades. Combichrist, Jason Graves and Noisia scored the game.

Beyond Space Remastered Edition is an action, adventure and simulation game developed by Silesia Games and Miroslaw Zielinski. It came out on 18-06-2014. It was published by Silesia Games. The game is rated as "Skip" on RAWG. Beyond Space Remastered Edition is available on macOS, PC and iOS. The game is sold via App Store and Steam.

Rage of the Gladiator is an action-adventure game developed by Gamelion and Huuuge Games. It was originally released in 2010. Gamelion published the game. You can play Rage of the Gladiator on Wii, Nintendo 3DS and iOS. The game is sold via Nintendo eShop and App Store.

Marvel's Spider-Man - Turf Wars is an action-adventure game developed by Insomniac Games. It was originally released in 2018. Sony Interactive Entertainment published the game. Marvel's Spider-Man - Turf Wars has a Metascore of 70, based on professional reviews. The game is rated as "Recommended" on RAWG. Marvel's Spider-Man - Turf Wars is available on PC and PlayStation 4. The game is sold via PlayStation Store.
